trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_00<tab>Word is that Guolgeim seeks an extra pair of hands.

TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_01<tab>Guolgeim bids you salvage whatever usable provisions still remain at a ruined camp nearby. Open the crates with a sledgehammer and collect the boxes of abandoned supplies.
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_02<tab>The area yields three boxes of supplies, none the worse for wear even after five years. Perhaps Guolgeim will tell you more when you deliver the haul.

TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SEQ_03<tab>After taking hold of the supplies, Guolgeim reveals to you her reluctance to visit the ruined Camp Revenant's Toll. It does one no good to pick through the detritus of a place that was dear to the heart...
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_TODO_00<tab>Open the crates with a sledgehammer.
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_TODO_01<tab>Give the boxes of supplies to Guolgeim.
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_000<tab>There's a ruined camp to the west of here. You know the place?

TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_001<tab>What I do is recover what I can from the site and bring it back here. The gil's good and the work is plentiful, but...I'm feeling a bit done in, to tell the truth.

TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_002<tab>I could use a little help, if you're looking for some honest work. Use this sledgehammer to break the locks on the crates, and bring back a few of the boxes inside─say, three.
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You obtain a box of abandoned supplies.
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_020<tab>You find the crates? Good, good. Let's have what you found inside.

TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_030<tab>I ought to be ashamed of myself for hiring another to do my own job, but...there's no cozening myself─it makes me heartsore to go there. The Calamity made it thus.

TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_031<tab>In case you didn't already know, that was Camp Revenant's Toll, a hub for 'venturers. Many a merry day and night I've spent there. 'Twas my abode at the crossroads.
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_032<tab>Never paid much mind to the name of these parts until the Calamity, but...Revenant's Toll. Not exactly a lucky sort of name.
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_033<tab>I wish to the Twelve that they had changed it to something else when they built this new camp.
TEXT_GAIUSC501_00989_GUOLGEIM_000_034<tab>It wearies me, is all...going there and sorting through the mess. Sometimes, I come across something I know well, and I... <sigh> It weighs on my heart.
